is a small Island in Malaysian Borneo in the state of

. This place is famous for excellent scuba diving. There are many wrecks (Mosquito, Jetty) and beautiful reefs to dive. There are also many small critters to find on the sandy bottom. Whale sharks are sometimes spotted there too.

and then take a boat from the resort.
